idea:
Tute is an online education platform providing live and interactive teaching into schools, PRUs, homes and other locations to fill gaps in capacity and curriculum, via the innovative Tute Learning cloud platform. Tute deliver lessons from Grade 3 to Grade 12 for IB, CBSE and ICSE and Grade 3 to A level for IGCSE in over 30 subjects.


Tute is a global education partner for Microsoft and a service partner for Hewlett Packard. Tute is a BETT award winning provider of live and interactive teaching online.
name: Tatsa Education

idea:
We provide highest quality fabric care to your belongings with environmentally safe and sustainable practices. We are a high quality professionally run fabric care provider that gives custom care to your precious garments, leather, shoes and bags. We also provide alteration and darning services. Our process is high-quality because we take extra care to ensure that your fabric comes clean unscathed. We identify fabric requirements of colour separations and temperature. We provide free pick up and drop services in areas we operate.

We are ISO 9001:2015 certified. We are also the winner of CINET Best Practices Award India 2020 in Retail Textile Care.
